message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm asking for $1,400,000.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay $1,300,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I'm motivated to sell,  $1,300,000 is below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still not able to go above $1,325,000. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down slightly further to $1,337,500.  I believe this represents a fair compromise and reflects the true value of this product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value and our previous discussions, I am willing to agree on a price of $1,330,000 for the product.
